docs.snippet: Kevyn Orr, the city’s new emergency manager, took office on Monday, extending a “sincere olive branch” to city leaders, whose salaries he may have to soon cut....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kevyn Orr, the city’s new emergency manager, took office on Monday, extending a “sincere olive branch” to city leaders, whose salaries he may have to soon cut.
docs.abstract: Detroit's new emergency manager Kevyn Orr extends 'sincere olive branch' to city leaders, attempting to build bridges with elected officials while preparing to impose financial controls that could include pay cuts for the mayor and City Council.

headline.main: Lawyer Outlines Challenges in New Job Fixing Detroit
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Outlines Challenges In New Job Fixing Detroit

docs.snippet: Don’t worry: the nagging and fault-finding proceed as usual in the “In a Word” section below. But first, a small and subjective sampling of sparkling prose from recent editions. Nominations are always welcome....
